short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor your Google Analytics hits in a structured report and export to a .csv file, to help you validate with your analytics team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy monitor your Google Analytics hits in a structured report:

- Hits grouped by pages
- Hit queries grouped by subject
- Filter your report by GA properties or event type
- Support for Universal Analytics and GA4
- Export to a .csv file, to help Analytics team validate your event implementation
